name: Animal
description: A troubled father-son relationship explodes into violence as the son transforms into a ruthless beast amidst the underworld. Ranbir Kapoor delivers a fierce performance in this action-packed emotional drama.
cast: Ranbir Kapoor, Anil Kapoor, Rashmika Mandanna, Bobby Deol

name: 365 Days
description: Massimo, a Sicilian mafia boss, kidnaps Laura and gives her 365 days to fall in love with him. Their dangerous relationship is filled with desire, control, and emotional chaos.

name: Arjun Reddy
description: A brilliant but self-destructive surgeon spirals into alcoholism and rage after his lover is forced to marry someone else. A raw, emotional journey of obsession, love, and redemption.

name: Aashiqui 2
description: A fading singer helps a budding artist achieve fame, only to struggle with his own demons and addiction. A passionate and tragic love story with unforgettable music.

name: Fifty Shades of Grey
description: Anastasia Steele, a literature student, enters a complex and passionate relationship with the mysterious billionaire Christian Grey, discovering a world of desire, power, and emotional conflict.

name: My Fault
description: Noah moves in with her mother’s wealthy new husband and finds herself irresistibly drawn to her arrogant stepbrother Nick. Secrets, rebellion, and forbidden love ignite in this steamy Spanish teen drama.

name: After
description: Tessa Young, a dedicated student and loyal girlfriend, enters college and meets Hardin Scott — a brooding rebel with a dark secret. Their romance tests boundaries and transforms her life forever.

name: Student of the Year
description: In a posh high school, two best friends fall for the same girl while competing for the Student of the Year trophy — testing friendship, loyalty, and ambition in the most glamorous way.
cast: Sidharth Malhotra, Varun Dhawan, Alia Bhatt

name: Step Up
description: A troubled street dancer gets a second chance when he's forced to work with a classically trained ballet student. As they bridge their worlds through dance, love and opportunity follow.

name: Rockstar
description: A passionate musician rises to stardom but struggles with heartbreak and pain as love and fame collide in his life.

name: Laila Majnu
description: In modern-day Kashmir, two star-crossed lovers battle tradition, society, and destiny in this poetic retelling of a legendary tale.

name: Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi
description: A simple man secretly enters a dance competition with his newlywed wife, transforming himself to win her heart.

name: Darr
description: An obsessive lover turns a woman’s life into a nightmare as he stalks her and wages psychological war on her fiancé.
cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Juhi Chawla, Sunny Deol

name: Bodyguard
description: A tough bodyguard falls for the woman he’s hired to protect, unaware she’s secretly in love with him too.

name: Mohabbatein
description: Love blossoms in a strict boarding school when a new music teacher challenges old rules with his ideals of romance.
cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Shah Rukh Khan, Aishwarya Rai

name: Sanam Teri Kasam
description: A shy librarian finds love and transformation in a rough, misunderstood man — but destiny has cruel plans.

name: Kal Ho Naa Ho
description: A dying man tries to bring joy to a woman’s life and unite her with the man who truly loves her.
cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Saif Ali Khan, Preity Zinta

name: Five Feet Apart
description: Two teens with cystic fibrosis fall in love but must maintain physical distance due to medical risk.

name: The Edge of Seventeen
description: A high school junior struggles through teen angst when her best friend starts dating her older brother.

name: Lootera
description: Set in the 1950s, a love story between a young archaeologist and a zamindar’s daughter is marred by betrayal and longing.

name: Love, Simon
description: A closeted gay teenager falls for an anonymous classmate online while navigating his identity and friendships.

name: Let It Snow
description: A snowstorm hits a small town on Christmas Eve, bringing together teens facing love and friendship.

name: Tall Girl
description: A tall high school girl finds confidence and love while overcoming bullying and insecurity.

name: The Perfect Date
description: A high school senior creates an app offering himself as a fake date to earn money for college.

name: Chemical Hearts
description: A high school student falls for a new girl who’s hiding deep emotional trauma.

name: Sierra Burgess Is a Loser
description: A case of mistaken identity leads to an unexpected romance between a smart outcast and a jock.

name: Purple Hearts
description: A struggling singer and a troubled marine enter a fake marriage for benefits — but emotions get real.

name: Guzaarish
description: A quadriplegic magician petitions for euthanasia as he finds a soulful bond with his caretaker, full of pain and poetry.
